Name: Apollo Lunar Mission
About the game: Ever wondered, how is it walk on the Moon’s surface? It is your time now to complete a Lunar mission in Virtual Reality. You can roam the Moon surface or ride the Lunar Rover in free mode. You can also complete a scientific mission on the Moon’s surface. *Land the Lunar Module on the surface of the Moon *Discover the Apollo Lunar Surface Experiments Package scientific instruments placed by the astronauts at the landing site *Place each scientific instrument at the designated area *Learn the facts about the scientific instruments and experiments * Walk roam freely on the Moon surface
